title: health professional schema
description: Schema to describe the details needed for health professionals within the the pip-apply application

fullName.description: Full name of the health professional

profession.description: identifies the profession of the named health care professional

phoneNumber.description: identifies the contact telephone number of the named health care professional

address.description: identifies the address of the named health care professional

lastSeenMonth.description: identifies the month when the claimant last saw the named health care professional

lastSeenYear.description: identifies the year when the claimant last saw the named health care professional
